item.title: Jenkins as a container
item.description: Run jenkins as a container with the stateful volume! Why Jenkins as a container ðŸ¤” It’s helps simplify the installation process. Decrease dependency errors. The Turnaround time for an Jenkins server installation is just few minutes. Cross platform compatible. Why do we need a stateful volume!ðŸ¤¨ Containers are often an ephemeral where in Jeknins we need to save our workloads even if we are not using it regularly.
